product_name: Ahnu Belgrove Sport Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When you want the comfort of sneakers but you need to step up the style a bit, the Ahnu Belgrove Sport shoes fit the bill with their good looks, lightweight support and cushioning. Contrast stitching and color accents highlight the water-resistant suede leather uppers with full-grain leather overlays. Synthetic mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and breathe well for enhanced comfort. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort; contoured, antimicrobial footbeds support arches and minimize odors. Ahnu Belgrove Sport shoes have non-marking rubber outsoles. Closeout.
short_description: When you want the comfort of sneakers but you need to step up the style a bit, the Ahnu Belgrove Sport shoes fit the bill with their good looks, lightweight support and cushioning.
